name: Javi eats noodles
description:
Disclaimer

You can break the game if you make very complicated drawings or move it too fast (ragdoll effect).

Try not to be too mean with the food :)

What is this?

Feed Javi before he starves to death or... worse happens!

Draw what Javi is thinking, when you're done, take the noodle you've drawn and put it in his mouth!

Try to draw the food as close as possible. If you don't, Javi will get more and more angry and you will end up losing the game.

Made in 48h for the jam: Mini Jam 82: Doodle

https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-82-doodle
